text: Abandoned textile mills on both sides, a two-story flat-i style building splits the roads 100 yards ahead. Still he metal scraping against asphalt.. .then it stops. head_text.subj: CAMERA PULLS AWAY FROM THEM FAST DOWN THE STREET LEAVING

text: Dicky walks like a hero down the streets of working class Lowell, locals spilling out of storefronts, lunch counter HBO camera following him.

(shadowboxing, moving) Look who's here! I'm comin' back, Lowell! Micky's gonna win, we got HBO here! Look at this -- He walks down the street like he's running for office, pe shouting his out his name. . .most everyone knows him...a even those who don't are charmed by this toothless Pied Piper... some look confused, surprised by his comeback, s hold memorabilia from his Sugar Ray Leonard fight to sign kisses a girl, laughs his missing-toothed grin. Dicky hig fives 19-year-old RAY RAMALHO, crew cut, body bent by cerebral palsy.

Ray Ray! Smile, you're gonna be in my movie! HBO's makin' a fuckin' movie about me! And my brothah's gonna win next week! He grabs Micky's arm again, they are trailed by the road guys (one holds a boom box) walking behind Dicky shaking their heads, smiling, following. "Don't Bring Me Down" continues... Everybody shouting out Dicky's name, "Dicky! "Dicky!" "Dicky!" Some calling "Micky!" "Micky!" "Micky!"

4 LOWELL MAN ON THE STREET INTERVIEWS. What Dicky & Micky to the city.. .What the city is all about, broken dreams, hope. . .How Micky & Dicky are both the pride of Lowell n forever... NO! JESUS! I'm not ready! Catch a glimpse of her tough, sexy, fighter's nose, years hard life, bleached-blonde hair, sucking on a Lucky Strik drinking by at a white-topped table cluttered with empty bottles, overflowing ashtrays, cigarettes burning out.
